name: Splosionz
description:
A  small game(one of my first 3d projects) I made for the Brackeys 2021.2 game jam.

Mostly a chaotic mess of physics, bombs and enemies who carelessly throw bombs(so be careful).

I Invested a lot of time into ragdoll physics and camera control. Tell me what you think. I feel like I could definitely expand on this. :)
